ygData.subject: Re: Crafted items (some idiot)
ygData.msgSnippet: I meant to say mid 20s and up, with the easiest being mid 20s. Although I bet a mid 20s necro or druid can solo a Griffon. ...
ygData.messageBody:
I meant to say mid 20s and up, with the easiest being
mid 20s. Although I bet a mid 20s necro or druid can
solo a Griffon.

--- dlobdell <dlobdell@...> wrote:
> From: "dlobdell" <dlobdell@...>
>
> Are you referring to all the quest items for the
> crafted armor? I disagree... Griffon eyes, arnt for
> mid 20's, and the Werewolf talon from mistmoore
> castle is REALLY not for mid 20's :)
>
> I think all quest items for the
> armor are suited for mid 20s. (if you are a
> kiter, you
> may be able to get them sooner).
>
> Belgarth
>
> --- Trevalien
> trevalien+AEA-hotmail.com wrote:
> +AD4APg- From: +ACI-Trevalien+ACI-
> trevalien+AEA-hotmail.com
> +AD4APg-

> cant kill
> +AD4APg- one at lvl 15
